name: texture cross section
desc: Project images from a fence onto a cross section surface.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Starting Percent
properties.desc: The Starting Percent slider controls how far along an image to start mapping onto the input surface.

properties.name: Starting Z Extents
properties.desc: The Starting Z Extents are the vertical range of the input field at the start of the image, these can be altered to change how the image is mapped onto the output.

properties.name: Control Point List
properties.desc: The list of control points used to match pixels to the model

properties.name: Ending Percent
properties.desc: The Ending Percent slider controls how far along an image to end mapping onto the input surface.

properties.name: Ending Z Extents
properties.desc: The Ending Z Extents are the vertical range of the input field at the end of the image, these can be altered to change how the image is mapped onto the output.

properties.name: Flip Horizontal
properties.desc: The Flip Horizontal toggle will cause the input image to be read from right to left instead of left to right

properties.name: Flip Vertical
properties.desc: The Flip Vertical toggle will cause the input image to be read from bottom to top instead of top to bottom

properties.name: Brightness
properties.desc: The Brightness slider can either add or remove brightness from every pixel.

properties.name: Contrast
properties.desc: The Contrast slider can either add or remove contrast from every pixel. Making bright spots brighter and dark spots darker

properties.name: Gamma Correction Red
properties.desc: The Gamma Correction Red slider affects the gamma value for the red channel.

properties.name: Gamma Correction Green
properties.desc: The Gamma Correction Red slider affects the gamma value for the green channel.

properties.name: Gamma Correction Blue
properties.desc: The Gamma Correction Red slider affects the gamma value for the blue channel.
